title: FS: T206 Red Cobb Portrait-Ex no longer available
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Red Cobb Portrait-Ex no longer available
posts.post_content:
Raw Red Cobb portrait for sale from my collection.  As with the other cards I have moved on BST, I guarantee this one will grade.  Nicely centered, no white spots in brilliant red background.  No creases, no wrinkles, no chipping, no back damage.  Faint pink and yellow horizontal line at top of back if from my scanner and is not on card.  

Email me at: [url]eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve card.  Emails to me take precedence over responses in this thread.  Paypal preferred.  Willing to make price contingent upon grade realized if purchaser wants to send in to PSA or SGC.  Many references available upon request.

Eric

Eric has some of the nicest raw T206 cards that I've seen in quite some time.  I have been fortunate enough to have purchased a few of them and thank him for being a great seller.

Good luck on your sale Eric.
Nice looking cards email sent regarding Chase and Waddell I will take them if still available. Thanks Daryl

posts.post_title: Bump for price reductions & a thanks
posts.post_content:
Scott,

Thanks for the kind words - I appreciate them and Im glad you are happy with your previous purchases.  

Today I adjusted (lowered) all of the prices on the remaining cards.  Also, if you are interested in the Matty, dont be afraid that its raw.  If you purchase it, you can send it to SGC or PSA and if it doesnt grade at least a PSA 5 or a SGC 60, you can return the card to me and Ill refund your money, including the grading fees so long as you return the graded card to me in the condition that you originally recieved it in.  Hope this helps anyone who is apprehensive about buying the card as I am confident it is that nice.  Thanks in advanced.

Eric

Buy w/confidence - I have had the pleasure of meeting and buying a few cards from Eric over the last couple years.  Always exceeded expectations in every way.  He nailed each grade prediction spot on, in fact - the last one I purchased where he guaranteed a 60 (SGC) or money back just came back a 70.

Thank you Eric!

with black backgrounds.  Only 4 cards left.  Thanks,

Eric

Hi Eric,
I'll take Duffy & Huggins.

posts.post_title: Bump to add a nice Cobb
Bump for price reduction and better scans
